trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStateChangedEventArgs.Cell%2A> property to determine which cell changed.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStateChangedEventArgs.Cell%2A>属性来确定哪个单元格更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStateChangedEventArgs.Cell%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStateChangedEventArgs.StateChanged%2A> property to determine which cell state changed.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStateChangedEventArgs.StateChanged%2A>属性来确定哪种单元格状态更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStateChangedEventArgs.StateChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStateChangedEventArgs"></xref> class.

This method uses the parameter values to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStateChangedEventArgs.Cell%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStateChangedEventArgs.StateChanged%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用的参数值来初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStateChangedEventArgs.Cell%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStateChangedEventArgs.StateChanged%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStateChangedEventArgs.StateChanged%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStateChangedEventArgs.Cell%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that has a changed state.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref> values indicating the state that has changed on the cell.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref>值，该值指示该单元格已更改的状态。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that has a changed state.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>具有已更改的状态。

trans-unit.source: Gets the state that has changed on the cell.
trans-unit.target: 获取单元格已更改的状态。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref> values indicating the state that has changed on the cell.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref>值，该值指示该单元格已更改的状态。
